channel.title: My bow attacks with melee?
channel.description:
Hi I recently added A Dragon bow and it attacks with melee attacks can anybody help me?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2009, 03:32:57 pm[/size][hr]PLZ HELP!!!!!!!!

item.title: My bow attacks with melee?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:5, topic:272135”]It really depends on your source.

The only thing I can really think of right now is

useBow = true;

Just do what Chassy said.

item.title: My bow attacks with melee?
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

lol, easy to learn coding you need to experiment with things

ONTOPIC: All you do is type Ctrl + F and search 861 then copy and paste under those brackets replace the second 861 with your id of your dragon bow

I know that much I did that the first time i ended with 100 errors with my not backedup files and skrewed my easter quest too TOOK HOURS

item.title: My bow attacks with melee?
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[quote=“Setsuna, post:2, topic:272135”] public void darkbow() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156) {
setAnimation(426);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(45);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(45);
SpecialDelay -= 1;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(50);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        startAnimation(426);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecDamg(50);
        SpecialDelay -= 1;
    }
}

(I THINK.)[/quote]

thats the spec i think.

Read full topic

item.title: My bow attacks with melee?
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

public void darkbow() {
    if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156) {
        setAnimation(426);
        actionTimer = 4;
        SpecDamgNPC(45);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        resetAnimation();
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecDamgNPC(45);
        SpecialDelay -= 1;
    } else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156) {
        int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
        int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
        int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(50);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        startAnimation(426);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecDamg(50);
        SpecialDelay -= 1;
    }
}

(I THINK.)

Read full topic
